channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Smallish? General rubbish dumped by gates, 23rd July
item.description:
Flytipped rubbish left by gates into the meadow ( down side of Beck Evan’s Farm. Could this be collected please, thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Water Lane, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: HGV diversion, 23rd July
item.description:
HGVs are using the diversion route for JCT 29-28 M25 closure not realising there is a low bridge on the the diversion route. No signs anywhere to suggest there is a low bridge to drivers and it’s causing mayhem on the route and blocking it up making drivers turn around and find an alternative
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Amazon Bags, 23rd July
item.description:
There are 6 Amazon parcel bags that have been flytipped here. Please could they be cleared asap

item.title: Disintegrated tarmac, 22nd July
item.description:
In 2023/2024 I highlighted the disintegrating tarmac issue to Barnet. An inspector subsequently came out but accidentally marked up multiple smaller areas for repair on the opposite side of the street instead, that were less significant. Vans and large delivery vehicles continue to park on the near side of the road and the damage to the tarmac is getting worse and gradually spreading wider. It needs to be repaired.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Lytton Close, Hampstead Garden Suburb, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sub letting, 22nd July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rectory Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sewage smell, 22nd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sunningdale Close, London
